'''Town Folk Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150616222128/https://mojang.com/2015/05/pocket-edition-getting-skins-chicken-jockeys-more/|title=Pocket Edition getting skins, chicken jockeys, more!|website=Mojang.com|date=May 26, 2015|author=Owen Hill}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 20 skins themed around being citizens of a medieval town. Together with the [[City Folk Skin Pack]], this is one of the first two skin packs released for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]''.

The skins included in this pack were designed by [[Garry Lucken]].<ref>{{citation|url=https://mojang.com/2015/05/pocket-edition-getting-skins-chicken-jockeys-more/|title=Pocket Edition getting skins, chicken jockeys, more!|website=mojang.com|author=Owen|date=May 26, 2015|quote=Our first two: City Folk and Town Folk have been designed by the talented, kind, and pixellated Army of Trolls.|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150526164021/https://mojang.com/2015/05/pocket-edition-getting-skins-chicken-jockeys-more/}}</ref> Some of these are based on skins included in [[Skin Pack 3]] and [[Skin Pack 4]].
